thread.title: Hunt for man spotted in Wilmslow wearing just a black bra and knickers - Manchester Evening News
thread.title_full: Hunt for man spotted in Wilmslow wearing just a black bra and knickers - Manchester Evening News

author: Sam Yarwood
title: Hunt for man spotted in Wilmslow wearing just a black bra and knickers - Manchester Evening News
text:
Hunt for man spotted in Wilmslow wearing just a black bra and knickers Police have received numerous calls about the man in recent months Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Police are continuing their hunt for a suspicious-looking man who has been lurking around Wilmslow in women’s underwear. 
Over the past few months officers have received numerous reports to say a man has been hanging around the Styal area of the Cheshire town, wearing just a black bra and knickers. 
The most recent sighting was on Friday morning, when what is believed to be the same person was spotted standing in a field off Styal Road, near to the water treatment centre. Read More Jail for women who lied about a friend 'trying to kill her baby' on Facebook - after she dies of overdose 
According to the caller, the man had been wearing a black t-shirt and long grey shorts, but then he went into a bush, and came out in just the underwear. 
They said the man was stood in the field, before moving closer to the road where passing vehicles began to beep at him. 
He then went back into the bush, put his clothes back on, and ran to a black Volkswagen Golf that had been parked nearby, before driving off towards Wilmslow. Read More Policeman tells of childhood abuse at hands of paedophile - as he sees his attacker finally jailed 
A spokesman for Cheshire Police confirmed the incident happened at around 10.30am. The suspect was described as being in his early 30s, very tall, athletic build, with short dark hair. 
Wilmslow Police posted on Facebook: “Man wearing ladies underwear, Styal Road, 10.30am today. Driving a Black VW Golf. Any info on male/vehicle call 101 quote inc 344 03/02/17.” Like us on Facebook
